com.github.sebhoss.testdata.impl

Class TestDataRule<I extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.sebhoss.testdata.impl.TestDataRule<I,O>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - The annotation to parse.
    O - The type of the data to load.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.junit.rules.TestRule

    public final class TestDataRule<I extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation,O>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.junit.rules.TestRule
    TestRule which loads data for a statement. The data is retrieved from an annotation which is applied to a statement.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TestDataRule(java.lang.Class<I> annotationToScan, TestDataReader<I,O> reader, TestDataEvaluator<O> evaluator) 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.junit.runners.model.Statement apply(org.junit.runners.model.Statement base, org.junit.runner.Description description)
      Retrieves the given annotation, reads all test data from it and returns a TestDataStatement which will load the given data when it is evaluated.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • TestDataRule

        @Inject
public TestDataRule(java.lang.Class<I> annotationToScan,
                   TestDataReader<I,O> reader,
                   TestDataEvaluator<O> evaluator)
        Parameters:
        annotationToScan - The annotation which holds information about the data to load.
        reader - The reader is used to retrieve data from an annotation.
        evaluator - The evaluator is used to evaluate a statement together with the previously retrieved data.
